meanings.definition: A person who does not cooperate with others.
meanings.sent1: The noncooperators in the group always prefer to work alone.
meanings.sent2: The noncooperators in the team never join group projects.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperators at the party avoided playing any team games.
meanings.sent4: The noncooperators in the office are like lone wolves in a pack.
meanings.sent5: The noncooperators stood out by always going against the group's decisions.

meanings.definition: Those who refuse to work together or collaborate.
meanings.sent1: The noncooperators in the meeting rejected every suggestion for teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The noncooperators in the community always resist any joint efforts.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperators at the picnic refused to participate in the group dance.
meanings.sent4: The noncooperators in the project are like islands in a sea of collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The noncooperators stood firm in their decision to work independently.
